name: QuestionnaireAdmissionEducationEmploymentProblems
title: Questionnaire Admission Education Employment Problems
description: Identifies the clinicians assessment of the clients functioning in the educational or employment setting at the time of admission.

concept.display: None (comfortable and competent in school or at work)
Slight (occasional or mild disruption of performance at school or work)
Moderate (occasional major or frequent minor disruptions; rarely meets expectations)
Severe (serious incapacity, absent motivation and ineffective functioning)
